sf164:6: dharmaṁ vo deśayiṣye ādau kalyāṇaṁ madhye kalyāṇaṁ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṁ yāvat prakāśayiṣye | yad uta mahāśūnyatānāma dharmaparyāyas tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣye |
sf164:7: mahāśūnyatādharmaparyāyāḥ katamāḥ | yad utāsmin satīdaṁ bhavaty asyotpādād idam utpadyate | yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṁskārā yāvat samudayo bhavati |
sf164:8: jātipratyayaṁ jarāmaraṇam iti | tatra ko jarāmaraṇaṁ kasya vā jarāmaraṇam iti hi syuḥ praṣṭāra iti ya evaṁ vaded ayaṁ jarāmaraṇam asya vā jarāmaraṇam | yaś caivaṁ vadet taj jīvaṁ tac charīram anyaj jīvam anyac charīram | ubhayam etad ekam | vyañjanam atra nānā |
sf164:9: taj jīvaṁ tac charīram iti dṛṣṭau satyāṁ brahmacaryavāso na bhavati | anyaj jīvam anyac charīram iti bhikṣavo dṛṣṭau satyāṁ brahmacaryavāso na bhavati | ity etāv ubhāv antāv anupagamyāsti madhyamā pratipad āryā lokottarā yathābhūtā aviparītā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ | yad uta jātipratyayaṁ jarāmaraṇam |
sf164:10: evaṁ jātir bhava upādānaṁ tṛṣṇā vedanā sparśaḥ ṣaḍāyatanaṁ nāmarūpaṁ vijñānam |
sf164:11: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṁskārā iti | tatra kaḥ saṁskārāḥ kasya vā saṁskārā iti hi syuḥ praṣṭāra iti ya evaṁ vaded ayaṁ saṁskārā asya vā saṁskārāḥ | yaś caivaṁ vadet taj jīvaṁ tac charīram anyaj jīvam anyac charīram | ubhayam etad ekam | vyañjanam atra nānā |
sf164:12: taj jīvaṁ tac charīram iti bhikṣavo dṛṣṭau satyāṁ brahmacaryavāso na bhavati | anyaj jīvam anyac charīram iti dṛṣṭau satyāṁ brahmacaryavāso na bhavati | ity etāv ubhāv antāv anupagamyāsti madhyamā pratipad āryā lokottarā yathābhūtā aviparītā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ | yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṁskārāḥ |
sf164:13: yataś ca bhikṣor avidyā viraktā bhavati vidyotpannā
sf164:14: tasya ko jarāmaraṇaṁ kasya vā jarāmaraṇam |
sf164:15: avidyāvirāgād vidyotpādād evam asya taj jarāmaraṇaṁ prahīṇaṁ bhavati parijñātam ucchinnamūlaṁ tālamastakavad anābhavagatikam āyatyām anutpādadharma |
sf164:16: yataś ca bhikṣor avidyā viraktā bhavati vidyotpannā
sf164:17: tasya ko jātir bhava upādānaṁ tṛṣṇā vedanā sparśaḥ ṣaḍāyatanaṁ nāmarūpaṁ vijñānam |
sf164:18: tasya kaḥ saṁskārāḥ kasya vā saṁskārāḥ |
sf164:19: avidyāvirāgād vidyotpādād evam asya te saṁskārāḥ prahiṇā bhavanti parijñātā ucchinnamūlās tālamastakavad anābhavagatikam āyatyām anutpādadharmāṇaḥ |
sf164:20: yataś ca bhikṣor avidyā viraktā bhavati vidyotpannā
sf164:21: tasyāvidyānirodhāt saṁskāranirodho yāvan mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati |
sf164:23: dharmaṁ vo deśayiṣye ādau kalyāṇaṁ madhye pūrvavad iti me yad uktam idaṁ tat pratyuktam ||
